observations.finding: Wednesday is the peak day for voting activity with 639,516 total reputation-affecting votes over the period. Tuesday and Thursday are close behind (~622-632K).
Weekend activity drops by 50-53% compared to mid-week. Saturday has 315K votes vs Wednesday's 640K (49% of Wednesday). Sunday is even lower at 300K (47% of Wednesday).
The upvote/downvote ratio is highest on Tuesday (6.9:1) and lowest on Saturday (4.86:1). Weekends see more critical/downvoting behavior relative to upvoting.
Total estimated reputation generated per week-type: mid-week (Tue-Thu) generates ~4.4M rep/day across all users, weekends generate ~2M/day - a 2.2x difference.
